short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in Rei Ayanami's calm aura with soothing blue tones and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the enigmatic and tranquil world of Rei Ayanami with this serene live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A calm and ethereal interface inspired by Rei’s mysterious and otherworldly presence, featuring soft blue, white, and silver tones reminiscent of her iconic aesthetic.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that complements Rei’s quiet and introspective nature.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Engage in Neon Genesis Evangelion-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as elegant and understated as Rei’s character.
